common.warning_irreversible: Please proceed with caution, this action is irreversible.

orders.reorder_description: You will be redirected to the payment page to reorder {{count}} item(s) for a total of €{{amount}}. Do you want to continue?

loyalty.how_it_works_description: Earn points with every purchase and use them to get discounts
loyalty.earn_points: Earn {{points}} points for every euro spent
loyalty.min_redeem: Use your points once you have at least {{points}} points
loyalty.max_discount: Get up to {{percentage}}% discount on your purchases
loyalty.history_description: Track the evolution of your loyalty points
settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile and account settings
settings.profile.title: Account Settings
settings.profile.heading: Profile Information
settings.profile.heading_description: Update your avatar, name and email address
settings.profile.name: Name
settings.profile.email_not_verified: Your email address is not verified.
settings.profile.resend_verification: Click here to resend the verification email.
settings.profile.verification_sent: A new verification email has been sent to your email address.
settings.password.title: Password
settings.password.heading: Update your password
settings.password.heading_description: Ensure your account uses a long, random password to stay secure
settings.appearance.title: Theme
settings.appearance.heading_description: Customize the visual appearance of your interface
settings.2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
settings.2fa.enabled_description: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted to enter a secure code during login, which you can retrieve from a TOTP-compatible app on your phone.
settings.2fa.disabled_description: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted to enter a secure code during login. This code can be retrieved from a TOTP-compatible app on your phone.
settings.2fa.modal_enabled_description: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
settings.2fa.modal_verify_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
settings.2fa.modal_setup_description: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app
settings.2fa.recovery_description: Recovery codes allow you to regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
settings.2fa.recovery_warning: Each recovery code can only be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click Regenerate codes above.
settings.delete.title: Delete your account
settings.delete.description: Delete your account and all its resources
settings.delete.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.delete.confirm_description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you wish to permanently delete your account.

home.reviews.title: What our customers say
home.cta.title: Ready to launch your project with Swell?
home.cta.description: Get started quickly with Swell, designed to simplify development and let you focus on what matters.
home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
home.faq.q1: What is the Swell starter kit?
home.faq.a1: Swell is a complete, ready-to-use e-commerce starter kit designed to accelerate the development of your web projects.
home.faq.q2: Who is this starter kit for?
home.faq.a2: It's designed for developers who want to quickly start a modern e-commerce project with a solid technical foundation.
home.faq.q3: What frameworks and technologies are used?
home.faq.a3: The starter kit uses Laravel for the backend, React and TypeScript for the frontend, and Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI for the interface.
home.faq.q4: Can I customize the components and structure?
home.faq.a4: Yes, all components and project structure are fully customizable to fit your needs.
home.faq.q5: Does the kit include product pages and more?
home.faq.a5: Yes, pages are provided directly to help you get started quickly.
home.faq.q6: How can I get help or contribute to the project?
home.faq.a6: You can check the documentation, join the discussion on GitHub, or submit contributions directly to the repository.
home.footer.description: A simple and flexible starter-kit to jumpstart your e-commerce projects.
home.footer.copyright: © {{year}} Swell. Built with Laravel. Contributions welcome.
